text.content: She walks with a limp because of a bike accident.
Some kids at school call her "Limpy," but Camila doesn’t let it bother her.
She has two best friends, Sofia and Mateo.
They accept her just the way she is.
One day, Sofia was approached by the popular group.
Their leader, Valeria, made Sofia an offer: join them and leave Camila behind.
She always dreamed of being part of the popularity crowd.
But then she remembered all the times she and Camila spent together at their corner hangout.
Sofia told Mateo about the offer.
"Camila has been our friend forever," he said.
She called Valeria and said, "I’m not leaving Camila. She’s beautiful inside and out."
That weekend, Sofia, Camila, and Mateo went to hang out at their favorite spot.
